direct-replacements.div-id-six:
Star Wars Quotes


  1. As you wish.
  2. Kid, I've flown from one side of this galaxy to the other. I've seen a lot of strange stuff, but I've never seen anything to make me believe there's one all-powerful Force controlling everything. There's no mystical energy field that controls my destiny. It's all a lot of simple tricks and nonsense.
  3. You're all clear, kid. Let's blow this thing and go home!
